question: The length of the diagonal of a square is 'a' cm. Which of the following represents the area of the square (in sq.cm) ?
explanation:
$latex Side = \\frac{Diagonal}{\\sqrt{2}}&s=1$ $latex = \\frac{a}{\\sqrt{2}}&s=1$
$latex \\therefore Area = (Side)^{2}&s=1$
$latex = \\left ( \\frac{a}{\\sqrt{2}} \\right )^{2} sq.cm = \\frac{a^{2}}{2} sq.cm&s=1$
Hence option [D] is the right answer.
